output_list.criticism: The mintToken function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the total supply, allowing the owner to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens to an arbitrary user account, causing a integer overflow in the user's balance. This vulnerability is correctness issue because it leads to predictable token distribution, potentially compromising the economic integrity of the token.

The mintToken function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the total supply, allowing the owner to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens to an arbitrary user account, causing a integer overflow in the user's balance. This vulnerability is correctness issue because it leads to predictable token distribution, potentially compromising the economic integrity of the token.
